verses.verse: The oracle <WH9294> which <WH834> Habakkuk <WH2265> the prophet <WH5030> saw. <WH2372>
How <WH575> long, <WH5704> O Lord, <WH3068> will I call <WH7768> for help, <WH7768> And Thou wilt not hear <WH8085>? I cry <WH2199> out to Thee, "Violence! <WH2555>" Yet Thou dost not save. <WH3467>

Why <WH4100> dost Thou make <WH7200> me see <WH7200> iniquity, <WH205> And cause [me] to look <WH5027> on wickedness <WH5999>? Yes, destruction <WH7701> and violence <WH2555> are before <WH5048> me; Strife <WH7379> exists <WH1961> and contention <WH4066> arises. <WH5375>

Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> the law <WH8451> is ignored <WH6313> And justice <WH4941> is never <WH3808> <WH5331> upheld. <WH3318> For the wicked <WH7563> surround <WH3803> the righteous; <WH6662> Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> justice <WH4941> comes <WH3318> out perverted. <WH6127>

"Look <WH7200> among the nations! <WH1471> Observe! <WH5027> Be astonished! <WH8539> Wonder! <WH8539> Because <WH3588> [I] am doing <WH6466> something <WH6467> in your days <WH3117> â€“ You would not believe <WH539> if <WH3588> you were told. <WH5608>

"For behold, <WH2009> I am raising <WH6965> up the Chaldeans, <WH3778> That fierce <WH4751> and impetuous <WH4116> people <WH1471> Who march <WH1980> throughout <WH4800> the earth <WH776> To seize <WH3423> dwelling <WH4908> places <WH4908> which are not theirs.
"They are dreaded <WH366> and feared. <WH3372> Their justice <WH4941> and authority <WH7613> originate <WH3318> with themselves.

"Their horses <WH5483> are swifter <WH7043> than <WH4480> leopards <WH5246> And keener <WH2300> than <WH4480> wolves <WH2061> in the evening. <WH6153> Their horsemen <WH6571> come <WH935> galloping, <WH6335> Their horsemen <WH6571> come <WH935> from afar; <WH7350> They fly <WH5774> like an eagle <WH5404> swooping <WH2363> [down] to devour. <WH398>
"All <WH3605> of them come <WH935> for violence. <WH2555> Their horde <WH4041> of faces <WH6440> [moves] forward. <WH6921> They collect <WH622> captives <WH7628> like sand. <WH2344>

"They mock <WH7046> at kings, <WH4428> And rulers <WH7336> are a laughing <WH4890> matter to them. They laugh <WH7832> at every <WH3605> fortress, <WH4013> And heap <WH6651> up rubble <WH6083> to capture <WH3920> it.

"Then <WH227> they will sweep <WH2498> through <WH2498> [like] the wind <WH7307> and pass <WH5674> on. But they will be held <WH816> guilty, <WH816> They whose <WH2098> strength <WH3581> is their god. <WH433>"

Art Thou not from everlasting, <WH6924> O Lord, <WH3068> my God, <WH430> my Holy <WH6918> One <WH6918>? We will not die. <WH4191> Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> hast appointed <WH7760> them to judge; <WH4941> And Thou, O Rock, <WH6697> hast established <WH3245> them to correct. <WH3198>

[Thine] eyes <WH5869> are too <WH4480> pure <WH2889> to approve <WH7200> evil, <WH9563> And Thou canst <WH3201> not look <WH5027> on wickedness <WH5999> [with favor.] Why <WH4100> dost Thou look <WH5027> with favor On those who deal <WH898> treacherously <WH898>? Why art Thou silent <WH2790> when the wicked <WH7563> swallow <WH1104> up Those more <WH4480> righteous <WH6662> than <WH4480> they?
[Why] hast Thou made <WH6213> men <WH120> like the fish <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> Like creeping <WH7431> things <WH7431> without <WH3808> a ruler <WH4910> over them?

[The Chaldeans] bring <WH5927> all <WH3605> of them up with a hook, <WH2443> Drag <WH1641> them away <WH1641> with their net, <WH2764> And gather <WH622> them together in their fishing <WH4365> net. <WH4365> Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> they rejoice <WH8055> and are glad. <WH1523>

Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> they offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2076> to their net. <WH2764> And burn <WH6999> incense <WH6999> to their fishing <WH4365> net; <WH4365> Because <WH3588> through these <WH1992> things <WH1992> their catch <WH2506> is large, <WH8082> And their food <WH3978> is plentiful. <WH1277>
Will they therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> empty <WH9553> their net <WH2764> And continually <WH8548> slay <WH2026> nations <WH1471> without <WH3808> sparing <WH2550>?
